name: Ridge Racer 3D
description:
Ridge Racer 3D is the first entry of the series on the Nintendo 3DS. It features the same arcade racing you would expect from any game carrying the Ridge Racer name.

The game features several single player game modes, including Grand Prix and Time Attack, and few multiplayer modes, including Single Race and Team Battle.

Ridge Racer 3D also supports trading ghost cars via the Streetpass feature. In Streetpass Duel mode, you can take on Ghost cars collected via Streetpass.
